feed.title: Online discussion on Taproot roll out - Tuesday July 20th 17:15 UTC

entry.title: Online discussion on Taproot roll out - Tuesday July 20th 17:15 UTC
entry.summary: On July 20th, an online Zoom call about Taproot roll out post activation in November was held. The discussion was focused on developers and was livestreamed on YouTube. The call was open to everyone who wanted to attend or watch. Murch has a wiki page monitoring planned ecosystem support of P2TR addresses. It would be great to hear from projects and businesses that have Taproot support on their medium/long term development roadmap or are considering it. The link for the meetup was shared where the Zoom link was announced. Before the call, draft pre-reading links were shared, which were expected to be finalized before Tuesday. The reading list can be found on https://gist.github.com/michaelfolkson/0803271754f851530fe8242087859254.The video and transcript from the online discussion on Taproot roll out that was held on July 20th are available. The event was focused on developers, but anyone was welcome to attend or watch. Murch has a wiki page that tracks planned ecosystem support of P2TR addresses, and the organizers encouraged projects and businesses with Taproot support on their development roadmaps to contribute to the discussion. The meetup link was provided where the Zoom link was announced. Before the discussion, draft pre-reading links were shared, which were expected to be finalized before Tuesday. The reading list is also provided on https://gist.github.com/michaelfolkson/0803271754f851530fe8242087859254.
